categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Kevin Thompson is an actor who played Chubbray, an Ewok that swung on a rope. He did most of the stunts as an Ewok. Swinging into the village,battling storm troopers, escaping explosions, shooting arrows and in the trees chopping ropes and blowing the horn to signal the start of the battle in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi, He wore many Ewok costumes but is most recognizable as a brown Ewok with a white slash over one eye. Chukha-Trok the toughest and bravest Ewok in Caravan of Courage: An Ewok Adventure, and an Ewok stuntman who did almost all of the stunts in Ewoks: The Battle for Endor. In addition to playing Chukha-Trok in Caravan of Courage, Thompson performed stunts in all three films, notably several vine-swinging stunts in Return of the Jedi. He also was in the Rose Parade with George Lucas, riding on the "Endor" float. The only one who was in the Movie Return of the Jedi.[source?]
